title: Day 13: More...
body: Painting... AND more tomorrow. I have pictures, but I'm too tired to post them. What? What was that?! Hey! I can make this post as small as I want to, mister! Oh. Oh, I can't, huh?! So that's how it's gonna be. Fine. Fine!
author: Dan

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
small posts get lots of comments
ive done studies

comments.author: justin
comments.body: I refuse to comment on such a small post!

comments.author: nathan springer
comments.body: its not the size that matters... i am sorry  that was uncalled for.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: painting eh? i sat around watching star wars and drinking beer all day. but painting's cool too.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body: I plan on bringing the Sideways poster by Monday around 6:00 if you will be there. And if you would like an extra hand with painting that night I'd be glad to help.
